# Githru MCP Server

A powerful Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides advanced Git repository analysis and visualization tools designed to enhance team collaboration.

--- ## üöÄ Overview The **Githru MCP Server** extends Claude‚Äôs capabilities through the **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** ‚Äî enabling real-time access to Git analytics, PR insights, and repository visualization. This MCP server is deployed on **[smithery.ai](https://smithery.ai)** and can be used directly from Claude‚Äôs MCP integration feature. --- ## üß© Prerequisites Before you begin, make sure you have: - **Claude Desktop App** (with MCP support) üëâ [Download here](https://claude.ai/download) - Access to the deployed **Githru MCP Server** on `smithery.ai` --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup in Claude 1. **Find the JSON configuration** - When you visit the [Githru MCP Server page on Smithery.ai](https://smithery.ai/server/@githru/githru-mcp-v1), click **‚ÄúConnect ‚Üí JSON‚Äù** to view the configuration details for our MCP server. 2. **Insert the Githru MCP configuration** - Claude Desktop reads MCP server settings from the `claude_desktop_config.json` file. You need to modify the `args` path inside your local configuration file. **File locations:** - **macOS:** `~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json` - **Windows:** `%APPDATA%\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json` ```json { "mcpServers": { "githru-mcp-v1": { "command": "npx", "args": [ "-y", "@smithery/cli@latest", "run", "@githru/githru-mcp-v1", "--key", "YOUR_API_KEY", "--profile", "PROFILE" ], "env": { "GITHUB_TOKEN": "YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN" } } } } ``` > üß† Tip: Replace the URL above with your actual Smithery MCP endpoint if it differs. 3. Save and reconnecting - After saving, Claude will automatically connect to your Githru MCP instance. - so reconnect Claude --- ## üß† About Model Context Protocol (MCP) MCP is an open standard that lets Claude connect to external data and services safely and dynamically. Your Githru MCP Server acts as a ‚Äúbridge‚Äù ‚Äî providing contextual Git insights directly within the Claude chat interface. For more on MCP: üëâ (https://modelcontextprotocol.io)[https://modelcontextprotocol.io] --- ## üìÑ License This project is licensed under the MIT License. --- ## ü§ù Contributing We welcome contributions! If you‚Äôd like to improve the Githru MCP Server, please open a PR or file an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/githru/githru-vscode-ext).

capabilities.name: contributor_recommender
capabilities.description: Recommends contributors who have contributed most to specific files/branches/PR areas by aggregating recent contribution data.

capabilities.name: feature_impact_analyzer
capabilities.description:
Takes a GitHub repository URL, Pull Request number, and authentication token as input.
        Analyzes the PR‚Äôs commits and changed files to compute impact metrics ‚Äî scale, dispersion,
        chaos, isolation, lag, and coupling ‚Äî and outputs a detailed HTML report highlighting
        long-tail file path outliers.

capabilities.name: author_work_pattern
capabilities.description: Analyzes an author‚Äôs development activity within a given period to measure workload and commit patterns. Aggregates metrics such as commits, insertions, deletions, and churn, and classifies commit types to reveal focus areas.

capabilities.name: render_storyline_ui
capabilities.description: Generate storyline visualization using FolderActivityFlow component with CSMDict data
